data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 750,898 who are far from you in Kâmpóng Spœ, Cambodia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kâmpóng Spœ, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Kâmpóng Spœ who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kâmpóng Spœ to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kâmpóng Spœ, Cambodia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.6% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Please, convict the 15,904 believers in Kâmpóng Spœ, Cambodia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, help the 15,904 believers in Kâmpóng Spœ to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kâmpóng Spœ, Cambodia has a population of 777,600.

We estimate Kâmpóng Spœ has 15,904 people who might know Jesus, 10,798 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 750,898 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Kâmpóng Spœ, Cambodia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
